          <title>
            <string language="en">Chromatogram of green, yellow and black paints</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Chromatogramm der grünen, gelben und schwarzen 
Farben</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Chromatogramme des peintures vertes, jaunes et 
noires</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Chromatogram de pinturas verdes, amarelas e 
pretas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Cromatogramma delle vernici verdi, gialle e nere</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χρωματογράφημα των πράσινων, κίτρινων και μαύρων 
χρωμάτων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cromatógrama de pinturas verdes, amarillas y 
negras</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration compares the chromatogram of the green, yellow and black paints taken from different samples.</string>
          </description>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung vergleicht das Chromatogramm der 
Grün-, Gelben und Schwarzenfarben, die von den unterschiedlichen 
Proben genommen werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration compare le chromatogramme des 
peintures de vert, jaunes et noires prises de différents 
échantillons.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração compara o chromatogram das 
pinturas do verde, as amarelas e as pretas feitas exame das amostras 
diferentes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione confronta il cromatogramma 
delle vernici gialle e nere di verde, prese dai campioni differenti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση συγκρίνει το χρωματογράφημα των 
πράσινων, κίτρινων και μαύρων χρωμάτων που λαμβάνονται από τα 
διαφορετικά δείγματα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración compara el cromatógrama de las 
pinturas del verde, amarillas y negras tomadas de diversas muestras.</string>
          </description>
